title: Dwarf brew

Dwarf brew

Item ID1501

Dwarf brew is a potent spirit made by Kamen. It is used in the later stages of the Underground Pass quest. It is obtained by using an empty bucket on a barrel inside Klank's house, found deep inside the underground pass.

The brew is used to light a pyre over the tomb of Iban, cremating his remains and turning them into Iban's ashes which must then be used on the doll of iban to create his effigy. The brew only needs to be used once on the tomb, after which it can be lit as many times the player likes as long as they don't possess the ashes in their inventory or have used such ashes on the doll.

This is the same beverage that Kamen offers to the player which causes the player to lose 4 Agility levels should they accept.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 July 2019
(update)

Kamen's homemade brew no longer damages the player between 3-5 Hitpoints.

22 March 2006
(update)

The item was graphically updated.

present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Although it is a bucket with liquid in it, the item lacks the option to empty it.

It is used in the later stages of the [[Underground Pass]] quest. It is obtained by using an empty [[bucket]] on a barrel inside [[Klank]]'s house, found deep inside the underground pass. The brew is used to light a pyre over the tomb of [[Lord Iban|Iban]], cremating his remains and turning them into [[Iban's ashes]] which must then be used on the [[doll of iban]] to create his effigy. The brew only needs to be used once on the tomb, after which it can be lit as many times the player likes as long as they don't possess the ashes in their inventory or have used such ashes on the doll.
